name: 50 Push-ups
description: Complete 50 push-ups as fast as possible.

name: 1 Mile Run
description: Run 1 mile without stopping.

name: Plank Hold
description: Hold a plank for 2 minutes.

name: 100 Jumping Jacks
description: Do 100 jumping jacks in a single set.

name: Wall Sit Challenge
description: Hold a wall sit for 2 minutes.

name: Burpee Blast
description: Do 30 burpees as fast as you can.

name: Yoga Flow
description: Complete a 10-minute yoga flow.

name: Squat Burner
description: Do 100 bodyweight squats as fast as you can.

name: 5 Min Jump Rope
description: Jump rope continuously for 5 minutes.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Do 100 mountain climbers as fast as you can.

name: Pull-up Max
description: Do as many pull-ups as possible.

name: Lunges Galore
description: Do 50 walking lunges per leg.

name: Bear Crawl
description: Crawl in a bear position for 1 minute.

name: 1 Min Handstand Hold
description: Hold a handstand for 1 minute.

name: High Knees
description: Do high knees for 2 minutes.

name: 30 Min Walk
description: Take a brisk 30-minute walk.

name: Side Plank
description: Hold a side plank for 1 minute each side.

name: Step-Up Challenge
description: Do 50 step-ups on a bench or box.

name: Crab Walk
description: Do a crab walk for 2 minutes.

name: Tuck Jumps
description: Do 20 tuck jumps as fast as you can.

name: Stretch Series
description: Complete a full body stretch for 10 minutes.

name: Jump Squats
description: Perform 40 jump squats as fast as you can.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Do 100 bicycle crunches.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Do 50 tricep dips on a bench.

name: 1 Mile Walk
description: Walk 1 mile outdoors or on a treadmill.

name: Shadow Boxing
description: Box the air with intensity for 3 minutes.

name: Box Jumps
description: Do 30 box jumps.

name: Skipping Ladder
description: Do 5, 10, 15, 20, 25 jumps with rest between.

name: Wall Push-ups
description: Do 30 wall push-ups for beginners.

name: Bird Dog
description: Do 20 reps per side of bird dog.

name: Glute Bridges
description: Do 50 glute bridges.

name: Sit-up Challenge
description: Do 100 sit-ups.

name: Diamon Push-ups
description: Do 50 diamond push-ups.

name: Punch Intervals
description: Do 30 seconds of punches, rest 10s, repeat 5x.

name: Heel Touches
description: Do 50 heel touches (obliques).

name: Duck Walk
description: Walk 10m in duck walk position.

name: Run Sprints
description: Sprint 100m x 5 rounds.

name: Stair Climb
description: Climb 10 flights of stairs.

name: Resistance Band Rows
description: Do 3 sets of 15 band rows.

name: Single-leg Balance
description: Balance on one leg for 1 min per side.

name: Dead Bug
description: Perform 3 sets of 10 dead bug reps.

name: Skater Jumps
description: Do 40 skater jumps.

name: Toe Touch Stretch
description: Hold a toe touch stretch for 2 minutes.

name: Russian Twists
description: Do 50 Russian twists (25 per side).

name: Side Lunges
description: Do 20 side lunges per leg.

name: Superman Hold
description: Hold superman position for 1 min.

name: Hip Openers
description: Do 10 reps per side of standing hip circles.

name: Dynamic Warm-up
description: Perform a full dynamic warm-up routine.
